roleset.name: not able to have an effect
roleset.note: INEFFECTIVE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, effective-j.01, effect.01. (from ineffective.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: No one really wants to strike and lose even more money , however it really is the only " weapon " that a lot of workers have , however ineffective it may be .

example.name: both args
example.text: Amoxicillin/clavulanic acid is ineffective at preventing otitis media in children with presumed viral upper respiratory infection:
example.arg: at preventing otitis media in children with presumed viral upper respiratory infection
